County Clare is lighting up today with solid surf: 8 ft @ 14s WNW and fresh 17 mph SE winds. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering fun waves throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 13 ft @ 14s WSW with fresh 23 mph WSW winds, making it poor across the board. By the day after, we see a nice recovery to 7 ft @ 12s W with light 7 mph SSE winds, perfect for a fun session at Crab Island or Doolin Point. Best: today.
